cast.name: Erik A. Williams Erik A. Williams

introduction: Today's millennials spend approximately 2 hours a day on dating apps, endlessly swiping, searching for dates, seeking a meet-up, looking for love and craving connection. It's a dating app world that leaves them lost and confused. They want a hook-up, a relationship, a way to safely explore all of their fantasies and to fulfill their emotional and sexual needs but have no idea how to get it. And, once they're in a relationship, they're not sure how to navigate it. Certified sexologist and intimacy coach Shan Boodram-the most sought-after sex educator on the internet-is about to change all that. In this Daily Essential, how-to, Quibi series, Shan shows viewers how to navigate the realities sex, dating and relationships in life today-when the rules of love and attraction are often confusing and fluid.
